expoGoNotice.title: Expo Go limitation
expoGoNotice.body: Background scanning dey pause for Expo Go. Build dev client or standalone app make the shield no sleep when you close am.

mockDetection.noMatches: No specific phishing pattern match, but the message still get risk.

onboarding.permissionNoteBody: After this quick tour you go grant notification and SMS access.
